name: WP Joomag
author: Joomag.

sections.description: This plugin is for WordPress 2.1 and higher which simplifies the embedding of Joomag publications in blog posts. Simply copy the WordPress embed code provided by Joomag and paste it into your post.
sections.installation:
Here’s how to install the plugin and how to make it work.

  1. Upload the wp-joomag.php file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Copy WordPress embed code from Joomag.com and paste it to your post: [joomag magazineid=XXX width=400 height=350 ... ].
sections.faq: Have questions or feedback? Please refer to our support forum.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0

This version includes significant improvements, which enables the user to embed full size viewer. It is compatible with the WordPress.com embed code that Joomag provides for each publication.

Version 1.1

Bug fixes.

Version 1.5

This version includes support for embedding bookshelves.

Version 1.5.5

This version includes new features like customization of toolbar and auto flipping.

Version 1.5.6

Bug fixes.

Version 2.0

We’ve rewrited the plugin. Now it’s using the WordPress Shortcode API.

Version 2.5.0

This version includes theme support.

Version 2.5.1

Add fullscreen option support.

Version 2.5.2

Add options to customize bookshelf.
